title: Our Wild Life
resume: Bobbie Jo and Jerry Abrams have a blended family all under one roof...three children, nanny, Naa Naa and 81 fur babies. The animal siblings include, a zebra, camel, kangaroos, llamas, wallabies and a recently adopted sloth.
